item.description: <h1 id="linux到手时需要安装"><a href="#linux到手时需要安装" class="headerlink" title="linux到手时需要安装"></a>linux到手时需要安装</h1><h2 id="安装的依赖"><a href="#安装的依赖" class="headerlink" title="安装的依赖"></a>安装的依赖</h2><pre class="line-numbers language-none"><code class="language-none">sudo apt-get install -y make build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev wget curl llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev xz-utils tk-dev libffi-dev liblzma-dev python-openssl<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre>
